revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=PePLink |model=Surf 200BG |revision=-AP (v2.5) |asin= |fcc_date=10/03/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability= |type=access point, CPE |fcc_id=SAN-SURF200BG-C, SAN-SURF200BG-C5, MK8CPX-05-WLM54G |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Kendin |cpu1_model=KS8695P |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064M90TAI-R4 |fla1_num=2 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V54C3256164VDI-7I |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Compex WLM54G |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-TNC |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.20.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=MSurf000 |oui=00:80:48 |oui_eth=00:11:6E }} {{TagLine|Integrated Home Wi-Fi Access Point}} :[https://www.peplink.com/products/industrial-wlan-solution/ Product page] {{•}} [http://site.microcom.us/PePLink_Surf_AP_appnote_integrated_home_WiFi_access_point.pdf Product Brief]
"WINTI03 v2.5" and "PePLink" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/SAN-SURF200BG-C/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-revised-711879 FCC photos].
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=28176 ''PePLink Surf 200BG-AP'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://www.tapatalk.com/groups/camerahacksfr/peplink-surf-200bg-t6676.html ''PePLink Surf 200BG-AP'' on '''CameraHacks'''] :CPU: [[Micrel]] KSZ8695P (@166MHz ARM9) :Flash: ''Spansion'' S29GL064M90TAI-R4 (8MB) :RAM: ''ProMOS'' V54C3256164VDI-7I (32MB) :WLAN: [[Atheros]] AR2413A ([[Compex WLM54G]]) :Main board is marked "WINTI03 PCB V2.5"
===See also=== *[[PePLink Surf 200BG]] (200mW, 5dBi antenna) :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SAN-SURF200BG SAN-SURF200BG] *[[PePLink Surf 200BG-AP]] (100mW, 5dBi antenna) :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SAN-SURF200BG-C SAN-SURF200BG-C] *[[PePLink Surf 400BG-AP]] (400mW, 5dBi antenna) :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SAN-SURF200BG-C5 SAN-SURF200BG-C5]
